channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Hi. Does anybody know the command that shows the co-ordinates of where you're standing?
I've been looking for this command for a [b]LONG[/b] time but I can't find it
Thanks :D

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“mypos”)) {
sendMessage(“You are standing on X=” + absX + " Y=" + absY);
}

that’s if you want the command, you may already have it.

Search “mypos” in client.java. If fit’s not there add it.

Read full topic
